channel.title: Harry Potter and the Methods of Rationality
channel.description: This is an alternate universe story, where Petunia married a scientist. Harry enters the wizarding world armed with Enlightenment ideals and the experimental spirit.
channel.itunes:summary:
This is an alternate universe story, where Petunia married a scientist. Harry enters the wizarding world armed with Enlightenment ideals and the experimental spirit.
Updated every Wednesday morning.
channel.itunes:author: Eliezer Yudkowsky, Eneasz Brodski; ty to JK Rowling
channel.itunes:subtitle: A project to bring the fanfic into audio format. Written by Eliezer Yudkowsky, read by Eneasz Brodski, based on the works of JK Rowling.
